wipe_camera_lens.description: Wipe the Camera lens to keep it clean and clear.

rotate_lens.description: Rotate the Camera lens to adjust focus.

clean_button.description: Clean the Camera button so it works correctly.

press_button.description: Press the Camera button to take picture.

clean_knob.description: Clean the Camera knob to ensure smooth manipulation.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the Camera knob to adjust the settings.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the Camera body to maintain its appearance.

wipe_camera_body.description: Wipe the Camera body to clean it from dust or any other particles.

extensive_cleaning.description: Thoroughly clean the entire Camera including body, lens, knob, and button.

operate_camera_clean.description: First clean the camera by wiping down the body, button, knob, and lens, then operate the camera by pressing the button after adjusting the knob and lens for desired settings.

clean_camera.description: Clean the entire Camera including the body, lens, knob, and button.

operate_camera.description: Operate the camera by pressing the button after adjusting the knob and lens for desired settings.
